26namespace
27{
28// Override clear color based on texture's write mask
29void OverrideMTLClearColor(const mtl::TextureRef &texture,
30 const mtl::ClearColorValue &clearColor,
31 MTLClearColor *colorOut)
32{
33 *colorOut =
34 mtl::EmulatedAlphaClearColor(clearColor.toMTLClearColor(), texture->getColorWritableMask());
35}
36
37const gl::InternalFormat &GetReadAttachmentInfo(const gl::Context *context,
38 RenderTargetMtl *renderTarget)
39{
40 GLenum implFormat;
41
42 if (renderTarget && renderTarget->getFormat())
43 {
44 implFormat = renderTarget->getFormat()->actualAngleFormat().fboImplementationInternalFormat;
45 }
46 else
47 {
48 implFormat = GL_NONE;
49 }
50
51 return gl::GetSizedInternalFormatInfo(implFormat);
52}
53
54}
55
56// FramebufferMtl implementation
57FramebufferMtl::FramebufferMtl(const gl::FramebufferState &state,
58 bool flipY,
59 WindowSurfaceMtl *backbuffer)
60 : FramebufferImpl(state), mBackbuffer(backbuffer), mFlipY(flipY)
61{
62 reset();
63}
64
65FramebufferMtl::~FramebufferMtl() {}
66
67void FramebufferMtl::reset()
68{
69 for (auto &rt : mColorRenderTargets)
70 {
71 rt = nullptr;
72 }
73 mDepthRenderTarget = mStencilRenderTarget = nullptr;
74
75 mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat = nullptr;
76
77 mReadPixelBuffer = nullptr;
78}
79
80void FramebufferMtl::destroy(const gl::Context *context)
81{
82 reset();
83}
84
85angle::Result FramebufferMtl::discard(const gl::Context *context,
86 size_t count,
87 const GLenum *attachments)
88{
89 return invalidate(context, count, attachments);
90}
91
92angle::Result FramebufferMtl::invalidate(const gl::Context *context,
93 size_t count,
94 const GLenum *attachments)
95{
96 return invalidateImpl(mtl::GetImpl(context), count, attachments);
97}
98
99angle::Result FramebufferMtl::invalidateSub(const gl::Context *context,
100 size_t count,
101 const GLenum *attachments,
102 const gl::Rectangle &area)
103{
104 if (area.encloses(getCompleteRenderArea()))
105 {
106 return invalidateImpl(mtl::GetImpl(context), count, attachments);
107 }
108 return angle::Result::Continue;
109}
110
111angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clear(const gl::Context *context, GLbitfield mask)
112{
113 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
114
115 mtl::ClearRectParams clearOpts;
116
117 bool clearColor = IsMaskFlagSet(mask, static_cast<GLbitfield>(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT));
118 bool clearDepth = IsMaskFlagSet(mask, static_cast<GLbitfield>(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT));
119 bool clearStencil = IsMaskFlagSet(mask, static_cast<GLbitfield>(GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT));
120
121 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers;
122 if (clearColor)
123 {
124 clearColorBuffers = mState.getEnabledDrawBuffers();
125 clearOpts.clearColor = contextMtl->getClearColorValue();
126 }
127 if (clearDepth)
128 {
129 clearOpts.clearDepth = contextMtl->getClearDepthValue();
130 }
131 if (clearStencil)
132 {
133 clearOpts.clearStencil = contextMtl->getClearStencilValue();
134 }
135
136 return clearImpl(context, clearColorBuffers, &clearOpts);
137}
138
139angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearBufferfv(const gl::Context *context,
140 GLenum buffer,
141 GLint drawbuffer,
142 const GLfloat *values)
143{
144 mtl::ClearRectParams clearOpts;
145 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers;
146 if (buffer == GL_DEPTH)
147 {
148 clearOpts.clearDepth = values[0];
149 }
150 else
151 {
152 clearColorBuffers.set(drawbuffer);
153 clearOpts.clearColor = mtl::ClearColorValue(values[0], values[1], values[2], values[3]);
154 }
155 return clearImpl(context, clearColorBuffers, &clearOpts);
156}
157angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearBufferuiv(const gl::Context *context,
158 GLenum buffer,
159 GLint drawbuffer,
160 const GLuint *values)
161{
162 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers;
163 clearColorBuffers.set(drawbuffer);
164
165 mtl::ClearRectParams clearOpts;
166 clearOpts.clearColor = mtl::ClearColorValue(values[0], values[1], values[2], values[3]);
167 return clearImpl(context, clearColorBuffers, &clearOpts);
168}
169angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearBufferiv(const gl::Context *context,
170 GLenum buffer,
171 GLint drawbuffer,
172 const GLint *values)
173{
174 mtl::ClearRectParams clearOpts;
175
176 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers;
177 if (buffer == GL_STENCIL)
178 {
179 clearOpts.clearStencil = gl::clamp(values[0], 0, static_cast<GLint>(mtl::kStencilMaskAll));
180 }
181 else
182 {
183 clearColorBuffers.set(drawbuffer);
184 clearOpts.clearColor = mtl::ClearColorValue(values[0], values[1], values[2], values[3]);
185 }
186
187 return clearImpl(context, clearColorBuffers, &clearOpts);
188}
189angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearBufferfi(const gl::Context *context,
190 GLenum buffer,
191 GLint drawbuffer,
192 GLfloat depth,
193 GLint stencil)
194{
195 mtl::ClearRectParams clearOpts;
196 clearOpts.clearDepth = depth;
197 clearOpts.clearStencil = gl::clamp(stencil, 0, static_cast<GLint>(mtl::kStencilMaskAll));
198
199 return clearImpl(context, gl::DrawBufferMask(), &clearOpts);
200}
201
202const gl::InternalFormat &FramebufferMtl::getImplementationColorReadFormat(
203 const gl::Context *context) const
204{
205 return GetReadAttachmentInfo(context, getColorReadRenderTargetNoCache(context));
206}
207
208angle::Result FramebufferMtl::readPixels(const gl::Context *context,
209 const gl::Rectangle &area,
210 GLenum format,
211 GLenum type,
212 const gl::PixelPackState &pack,
213 gl::Buffer *packBuffer,
214 void *pixels)
215{
216 // Clip read area to framebuffer.
217 const gl::Extents &fbSize = getState().getReadAttachment()->getSize();
218 const gl::Rectangle fbRect(0, 0, fbSize.width, fbSize.height);
219
220 gl::Rectangle clippedArea;
221 if (!ClipRectangle(area, fbRect, &clippedArea))
222 {
223 // nothing to read
224 return angle::Result::Continue;
225 }
226 gl::Rectangle flippedArea = getCorrectFlippedReadArea(context, clippedArea);
227
228 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
229
230 const gl::InternalFormat &sizedFormatInfo = gl::GetInternalFormatInfo(format, type);
231
232 GLuint outputPitch = 0;
233 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_MATH(contextMtl,
234 sizedFormatInfo.computeRowPitch(type, area.width, pack.alignment,
235 pack.rowLength, &outputPitch));
236 GLuint outputSkipBytes = 0;
237 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_MATH(contextMtl, sizedFormatInfo.computeSkipBytes(type, outputPitch, 0, pack,
238 false, &outputSkipBytes));
239
240 outputSkipBytes += (clippedArea.x - area.x) * sizedFormatInfo.pixelBytes +
241 (clippedArea.y - area.y) * outputPitch;
242
243 const angle::Format &angleFormat = GetFormatFromFormatType(format, type);
244
245 PackPixelsParams params(flippedArea, angleFormat, outputPitch, pack.reverseRowOrder, packBuffer,
246 0);
247
248 if (params.packBuffer)
249 {
250 // If PBO is active, pixels is treated as offset.
251 params.offset = reinterpret_cast<ptrdiff_t>(pixels) + outputSkipBytes;
252 }
253
254 if (mFlipY)
255 {
256 params.reverseRowOrder = !params.reverseRowOrder;
257 }
258
259 ANGLE_TRY(readPixelsImpl(context, flippedArea, params, getColorReadRenderTarget(context),
260 static_cast<uint8_t *>(pixels) + outputSkipBytes));
261
262 return angle::Result::Continue;
263}
264
265angle::Result FramebufferMtl::blit(const gl::Context *context,
266 const gl::Rectangle &sourceAreaIn,
267 const gl::Rectangle &destAreaIn,
268 GLbitfield mask,
269 GLenum filter)
270{
271 bool blitColorBuffer = (mask & GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT) != 0;
272 bool blitDepthBuffer = (mask & GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT) != 0;
273 bool blitStencilBuffer = (mask & GL_STENCIL_BUFFER_BIT) != 0;
274
275 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
276 const gl::Framebuffer *glSrcFramebuffer = glState.getReadFramebuffer();
277
278 FramebufferMtl *srcFrameBuffer = mtl::GetImpl(glSrcFramebuffer);
279
280 blitColorBuffer =
281 blitColorBuffer && srcFrameBuffer->getColorReadRenderTarget(context) != nullptr;
282 blitDepthBuffer = blitDepthBuffer && srcFrameBuffer->getDepthRenderTarget() != nullptr;
283 blitStencilBuffer = blitStencilBuffer && srcFrameBuffer->getStencilRenderTarget() != nullptr;
284
285 if (!blitColorBuffer && !blitDepthBuffer && !blitStencilBuffer)
286 {
287 // No-op
288 return angle::Result::Continue;
289 }
290
291 gl::Rectangle sourceArea = sourceAreaIn;
292 gl::Rectangle destArea = destAreaIn;
293
294 const gl::Rectangle srcFramebufferDimensions = srcFrameBuffer->getCompleteRenderArea();
295
296 // If the destination is flipped in either direction, we will flip the source instead so that
297 // the destination area is always unflipped.
298 sourceArea = sourceArea.flip(destArea.isReversedX(), destArea.isReversedY());
299 destArea = destArea.removeReversal();
300
301 // Calculate the stretch factor prior to any clipping, as it needs to remain constant.
302 const float stretch[2] = {
303 std::abs(sourceArea.width / static_cast<float>(destArea.width)),
304 std::abs(sourceArea.height / static_cast<float>(destArea.height)),
305 };
306
307 // First, clip the source area to framebuffer. That requires transforming the dest area to
308 // match the clipped source.
309 gl::Rectangle absSourceArea = sourceArea.removeReversal();
310 gl::Rectangle clippedSourceArea;
311 if (!gl::ClipRectangle(srcFramebufferDimensions, absSourceArea, &clippedSourceArea))
312 {
313 return angle::Result::Continue;
314 }
315
316 // Resize the destination area based on the new size of source. Note again that stretch is
317 // calculated as SrcDimension/DestDimension.
318 gl::Rectangle srcClippedDestArea;
319 if (clippedSourceArea == absSourceArea)
320 {
321 // If there was no clipping, keep dest area as is.
322 srcClippedDestArea = destArea;
323 }
324 else
325 {
326 // Shift dest area's x0,y0,x1,y1 by as much as the source area's got shifted (taking
327 // stretching into account)
328 float x0Shift = std::round((clippedSourceArea.x - absSourceArea.x) / stretch[0]);
329 float y0Shift = std::round((clippedSourceArea.y - absSourceArea.y) / stretch[1]);
330 float x1Shift = std::round((absSourceArea.x1() - clippedSourceArea.x1()) / stretch[0]);
331 float y1Shift = std::round((absSourceArea.y1() - clippedSourceArea.y1()) / stretch[1]);
332
333 // If the source area was reversed in any direction, the shift should be applied in the
334 // opposite direction as well.
335 if (sourceArea.isReversedX())
336 {
337 std::swap(x0Shift, x1Shift);
338 }
339
340 if (sourceArea.isReversedY())
341 {
342 std::swap(y0Shift, y1Shift);
343 }
344
345 srcClippedDestArea.x = destArea.x0() + static_cast<int>(x0Shift);
346 srcClippedDestArea.y = destArea.y0() + static_cast<int>(y0Shift);
347 int x1 = destArea.x1() - static_cast<int>(x1Shift);
348 int y1 = destArea.y1() - static_cast<int>(y1Shift);
349
350 srcClippedDestArea.width = x1 - srcClippedDestArea.x;
351 srcClippedDestArea.height = y1 - srcClippedDestArea.y;
352 }
353
354 // Flip source area if necessary
355 clippedSourceArea = srcFrameBuffer->getCorrectFlippedReadArea(context, clippedSourceArea);
356
357 bool unpackFlipX = sourceArea.isReversedX();
358 bool unpackFlipY = sourceArea.isReversedY();
359
360 if (srcFrameBuffer->flipY())
361 {
362 // The rectangle already flipped by calling getCorrectFlippedReadArea(). So reverse the
363 // unpackFlipY flag.
364 unpackFlipY = !unpackFlipY;
365 }
366
367 ASSERT(!destArea.isReversedX() && !destArea.isReversedY());
368
369 // Clip the destination area to the framebuffer size and scissor.
370 gl::Rectangle scissoredDestArea;
371 if (!gl::ClipRectangle(ClipRectToScissor(glState, this->getCompleteRenderArea(), false),
372 srcClippedDestArea, &scissoredDestArea))
373 {
374 return angle::Result::Continue;
375 }
376
377 // Use blit with draw
378 mtl::BlitParams baseParams;
379 baseParams.dstTextureSize = mState.getExtents();
380 baseParams.dstRect = srcClippedDestArea;
381 baseParams.dstScissorRect = scissoredDestArea;
382 baseParams.dstFlipY = this->flipY();
383
384 baseParams.srcRect = clippedSourceArea;
385 // This flag is for auto flipping the rect inside RenderUtils. Since we already flip it using
386 // getCorrectFlippedReadArea(). This flag is not needed.
387 baseParams.srcYFlipped = false;
388 baseParams.unpackFlipX = unpackFlipX;
389 baseParams.unpackFlipY = unpackFlipY;
390
391 return blitWithDraw(context, srcFrameBuffer, blitColorBuffer, blitDepthBuffer,
392 blitStencilBuffer, filter, baseParams);
393}
394
395angle::Result FramebufferMtl::blitWithDraw(const gl::Context *context,
396 FramebufferMtl *srcFrameBuffer,
397 bool blitColorBuffer,
398 bool blitDepthBuffer,
399 bool blitStencilBuffer,
400 GLenum filter,
401 const mtl::BlitParams &baseParams)
402{
403 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
404 // Use blit with draw
405 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *renderEncoder = nullptr;
406
407 // Blit Depth & stencil
408 if (blitDepthBuffer || blitStencilBuffer)
409 {
410 mtl::DepthStencilBlitParams dsBlitParams;
411 memcpy(&dsBlitParams, &baseParams, sizeof(baseParams));
412 RenderTargetMtl *srcDepthRt = srcFrameBuffer->getDepthRenderTarget();
413 RenderTargetMtl *srcStencilRt = srcFrameBuffer->getStencilRenderTarget();
414
415 if (blitDepthBuffer)
416 {
417 dsBlitParams.src = srcDepthRt->getTexture();
418 dsBlitParams.srcLevel = srcDepthRt->getLevelIndex();
419 dsBlitParams.srcLayer = srcDepthRt->getLayerIndex();
420 }
421
422 if (blitStencilBuffer && srcStencilRt->getTexture())
423 {
424 dsBlitParams.srcStencil = srcStencilRt->getTexture()->getStencilView();
425 dsBlitParams.srcLevel = srcStencilRt->getLevelIndex();
426 dsBlitParams.srcLayer = srcStencilRt->getLayerIndex();
427
428 if (!contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().hasStencilOutput.enabled &&
429 mStencilRenderTarget)
430 {
431 // Directly writing to stencil in shader is not supported, use temporary copy buffer
432 // work around. This is a compute pass.
433 mtl::StencilBlitViaBufferParams stencilOnlyBlitParams = dsBlitParams;
434 stencilOnlyBlitParams.dstStencil = mStencilRenderTarget->getTexture();
435 stencilOnlyBlitParams.dstStencilLayer = mStencilRenderTarget->getLayerIndex();
436 stencilOnlyBlitParams.dstStencilLevel = mStencilRenderTarget->getLevelIndex();
437 stencilOnlyBlitParams.dstPackedDepthStencilFormat =
438 mStencilRenderTarget->getFormat()->hasDepthAndStencilBits();
439
440 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils().blitStencilViaCopyBuffer(
441 context, stencilOnlyBlitParams));
442
443 // Prevent the stencil to be blitted with draw again
444 dsBlitParams.srcStencil = nullptr;
445 }
446 }
447
448 // The actual blitting of depth and/or stencil
449 renderEncoder = ensureRenderPassStarted(context);
450 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils().blitDepthStencilWithDraw(
451 context, renderEncoder, dsBlitParams));
452 } // if (blitDepthBuffer || blitStencilBuffer)
453 else
454 {
455 renderEncoder = ensureRenderPassStarted(context);
456 }
457
458 // Blit color
459 if (blitColorBuffer)
460 {
461 mtl::ColorBlitParams colorBlitParams;
462 memcpy(&colorBlitParams, &baseParams, sizeof(baseParams));
463
464 RenderTargetMtl *srcColorRt = srcFrameBuffer->getColorReadRenderTarget(context);
465 ASSERT(srcColorRt);
466
467 colorBlitParams.src = srcColorRt->getTexture();
468 colorBlitParams.srcLevel = srcColorRt->getLevelIndex();
469 colorBlitParams.srcLayer = srcColorRt->getLayerIndex();
470
471 colorBlitParams.blitColorMask = MTLColorWriteMaskAll;
472 colorBlitParams.enabledBuffers = getState().getEnabledDrawBuffers();
473 colorBlitParams.filter = filter;
474 colorBlitParams.dstLuminance = srcColorRt->getFormat()->actualAngleFormat().isLUMA();
475
476 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils().blitColorWithDraw(
477 context, renderEncoder, srcColorRt->getFormat()->actualAngleFormat(), colorBlitParams));
478 }
479
480 return angle::Result::Continue;
481}
482
483bool FramebufferMtl::checkStatus(const gl::Context *context) const
484{
485 if (!mState.attachmentsHaveSameDimensions())
486 {
487 return false;
488 }
489
490 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
491 if (!contextMtl->getDisplay()->getFeatures().allowSeparatedDepthStencilBuffers.enabled &&
492 mState.hasSeparateDepthAndStencilAttachments())
493 {
494 return false;
495 }
496
497 if (mState.getDepthAttachment() && mState.getDepthAttachment()->getFormat().info->depthBits &&
498 mState.getDepthAttachment()->getFormat().info->stencilBits)
499 {
500 return checkPackedDepthStencilAttachment();
501 }
502
503 if (mState.getStencilAttachment() &&
504 mState.getStencilAttachment()->getFormat().info->depthBits &&
505 mState.getStencilAttachment()->getFormat().info->stencilBits)
506 {
507 return checkPackedDepthStencilAttachment();
508 }
509 return true;
510}
511
512bool FramebufferMtl::checkPackedDepthStencilAttachment() const
513{
514 if (ANGLE_APPLE_AVAILABLE_XCI(10.14, 13.0, 12.0))
515 {
516 // If depth/stencil attachment has depth & stencil bits, then depth & stencil must not have
517 // separate attachment. i.e. They must be the same texture or one of them has no
518 // attachment.
519 if (mState.hasSeparateDepthAndStencilAttachments())
520 {
521 WARN() << "Packed depth stencil texture/buffer must not be mixed with other "
522 "texture/buffer.";
523 return false;
524 }
525 }
526 else
527 {
528 // Metal 2.0 and below doesn't allow packed depth stencil texture to be attached only as
529 // depth or stencil buffer. i.e. None of the depth & stencil attachment can be null.
530 if (!mState.getDepthStencilAttachment())
531 {
532 WARN() << "Packed depth stencil texture/buffer must be bound to both depth & stencil "
533 "attachment point.";
534 return false;
535 }
536 }
537 return true;
538}
539
540angle::Result FramebufferMtl::syncState(const gl::Context *context,
541 GLenum binding,
542 const gl::Framebuffer::DirtyBits &dirtyBits,
543 gl::Command command)
544{
545 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
546 bool mustNotifyContext = false;
547 // Cache old mRenderPassDesc before update*RenderTarget() invalidate it.
548 mtl::RenderPassDesc oldRenderPassDesc = mRenderPassDesc;
549
550 for (size_t dirtyBit : dirtyBits)
551 {
552 switch (dirtyBit)
553 {
554 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT:
555 ANGLE_TRY(updateDepthRenderTarget(context));
556 break;
557 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT:
558 ANGLE_TRY(updateStencilRenderTarget(context));
559 break;
560 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEPTH_BUFFER_CONTENTS:
561 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_STENCIL_BUFFER_CONTENTS:
562 // NOTE(hqle): What are we supposed to do?
563 break;
564 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DRAW_BUFFERS:
565 mustNotifyContext = true;
566 break;
567 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_READ_BUFFER:
568 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEFAULT_WIDTH:
569 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEFAULT_HEIGHT:
570 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEFAULT_SAMPLES:
571 case gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_DEFAULT_FIXED_SAMPLE_LOCATIONS:
572 break;
573 default:
574 {
575 static_assert(gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_0 == 0, "FB dirty bits");
576 if (dirtyBit < gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_MAX)
577 {
578 size_t colorIndexGL = static_cast<size_t>(
579 dirtyBit - gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_0);
580 ANGLE_TRY(updateColorRenderTarget(context, colorIndexGL));
581 }
582 else
583 {
584 ASSERT(dirtyBit >= gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_BUFFER_CONTENTS_0 &&
585 dirtyBit < gl::Framebuffer::DIRTY_BIT_COLOR_BUFFER_CONTENTS_MAX);
586 // NOTE: might need to notify context.
587 }
588 break;
589 }
590 }
591 }
592
593 ANGLE_TRY(prepareRenderPass(context, &mRenderPassDesc));
594 bool renderPassChanged = !oldRenderPassDesc.equalIgnoreLoadStoreOptions(mRenderPassDesc);
595
596 if (mustNotifyContext || renderPassChanged)
597 {
598 FramebufferMtl *currentDrawFramebuffer =
599 mtl::GetImpl(context->getState().getDrawFramebuffer());
600 if (currentDrawFramebuffer == this)
601 {
602 contextMtl->onDrawFrameBufferChangedState(context, this, renderPassChanged);
603 }
604
605 // Recreate pixel reading buffer if needed in future.
606 mReadPixelBuffer = nullptr;
607 }
608
609 return angle::Result::Continue;
610}
611
612angle::Result FramebufferMtl::getSamplePosition(const gl::Context *context,
613 size_t index,
614 GLfloat *xy) const
615{
616 UNIMPLEMENTED();
617 return angle::Result::Stop;
618}
619
620RenderTargetMtl *FramebufferMtl::getColorReadRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context) const
621{
622 if (mState.getReadIndex() >= mColorRenderTargets.size())
623 {
624 return nullptr;
625 }
626
627 if (mBackbuffer)
628 {
629 bool isNewDrawable = false;
630 if (IsError(mBackbuffer->ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, &isNewDrawable)))
631 {
632 return nullptr;
633 }
634
635 if (isNewDrawable && mBackbuffer->hasRobustResourceInit())
636 {
637 (void)mBackbuffer->initializeContents(context, gl::ImageIndex::Make2D(0));
638 }
639 }
640
641 return mColorRenderTargets[mState.getReadIndex()];
642}
643
644RenderTargetMtl *FramebufferMtl::getColorReadRenderTargetNoCache(const gl::Context *context) const
645{
646 if (mState.getReadIndex() >= mColorRenderTargets.size())
647 {
648 return nullptr;
649 }
650
651 if (mBackbuffer)
652 {
653 //If we have a backbuffer/window surface, we can take the old path here and return
654 //the cached color render target.
655 return getColorReadRenderTarget(context);
656 }
657 //If we have no backbuffer, get the attachment from state color attachments, as it may have changed before syncing.
658 const gl::FramebufferAttachment * attachment = mState.getColorAttachment(mState.getReadIndex());
659 RenderTargetMtl * currentTarget = nullptr;
660 if(attachment->getRenderTarget(context, attachment->getRenderToTextureSamples(),
661 &currentTarget) == angle::Result::Stop)
662 {
663 return nullptr;
664 }
665 return currentTarget;
666}
667
668int FramebufferMtl::getSamples() const
669{
670 return mRenderPassDesc.sampleCount;
671}
672
673gl::Rectangle FramebufferMtl::getCompleteRenderArea() const
674{
675 return gl::Rectangle(0, 0, mState.getDimensions().width, mState.getDimensions().height);
676}
677
678bool FramebufferMtl::renderPassHasStarted(ContextMtl *contextMtl) const
679{
680 return contextMtl->hasStartedRenderPass(mRenderPassDesc);
681}
682
683mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *FramebufferMtl::ensureRenderPassStarted(const gl::Context *context)
684{
685 return ensureRenderPassStarted(context, mRenderPassDesc);
686}
687
688mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *FramebufferMtl::ensureRenderPassStarted(const gl::Context *context,
689 const mtl::RenderPassDesc &desc)
690{
691 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
692
693 if (mBackbuffer)
694 {
695 // Backbuffer might obtain new drawable, which means it might change the
696 // the native texture used as the target of the render pass.
697 // We need to call this before creating render encoder.
698 bool isNewDrawable;
699 if (IsError(mBackbuffer->ensureCurrentDrawableObtained(context, &isNewDrawable)))
700 {
701 return nullptr;
702 }
703
704 if (isNewDrawable && mBackbuffer->hasRobustResourceInit())
705 {
706 // Apply robust resource initialization on newly obtained drawable.
707 (void)mBackbuffer->initializeContents(context, gl::ImageIndex::Make2D(0));
708 }
709 }
710
711 // Only support ensureRenderPassStarted() with different load & store options only. The
712 // texture, level, slice must be the same.
713 ASSERT(desc.equalIgnoreLoadStoreOptions(mRenderPassDesc));
714
715 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = contextMtl->getRenderPassCommandEncoder(desc);
716
717 if (mRenderPassCleanStart)
718 {
719 // After a clean start we should reset the loadOp to MTLLoadActionLoad in case this render
720 // pass could be interrupted by a conversion compute shader pass then being resumed later.
721 mRenderPassCleanStart = false;
722 for (mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment : mRenderPassDesc.colorAttachments)
723 {
724 colorAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionLoad;
725 }
726 mRenderPassDesc.depthAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionLoad;
727 mRenderPassDesc.stencilAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionLoad;
728 }
729
730 return encoder;
731}
732
733void FramebufferMtl::setLoadStoreActionOnRenderPassFirstStart(
734 mtl::RenderPassAttachmentDesc *attachmentOut, const bool forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad)
735{
736 ASSERT(mRenderPassCleanStart);
737
738 mtl::RenderPassAttachmentDesc &attachment = *attachmentOut;
739
740 if (!forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad &&
741 (attachment.storeAction == MTLStoreActionDontCare ||
742 attachment.storeAction == MTLStoreActionMultisampleResolve))
743 {
744 // If we previously discarded attachment's content, then don't need to load it.
745 attachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionDontCare;
746 }
747 else
748 {
749 attachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionLoad;
750 }
751
752 if (attachment.hasImplicitMSTexture())
753 {
754 attachment.storeAction = MTLStoreActionStoreAndMultisampleResolve;
755 }
756 else
757 {
758 attachment.storeAction = MTLStoreActionStore; // Default action is store
759 }
760}
761
762void FramebufferMtl::onStartedDrawingToFrameBuffer(const gl::Context *context)
763{
764 mRenderPassCleanStart = true;
765
766 // If any of the render targets need to load their multisample textures, we should do the same for depth/stencil.
767 bool forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad = false;
768
769 // Compute loadOp based on previous storeOp and reset storeOp flags:
770 for (mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment : mRenderPassDesc.colorAttachments)
771 {
772 forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad |= colorAttachment.storeAction == MTLStoreActionStoreAndMultisampleResolve;
773 setLoadStoreActionOnRenderPassFirstStart(&colorAttachment, false);
774 }
775 // Depth load/store
776 setLoadStoreActionOnRenderPassFirstStart(&mRenderPassDesc.depthAttachment, forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad);
777
778 // Stencil load/store
779 setLoadStoreActionOnRenderPassFirstStart(&mRenderPassDesc.stencilAttachment, forceDepthStencilMultisampleLoad);
780}
781
782void FramebufferMtl::onFrameEnd(const gl::Context *context)
783{
784 if (!mBackbuffer || mBackbuffer->preserveBuffer())
785 {
786 return;
787 }
788
789 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
790 // Always discard default FBO's depth stencil & multisample buffers at the end of the frame:
791 if (this->renderPassHasStarted(contextMtl))
792 {
793 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = contextMtl->getRenderCommandEncoder();
794
795 constexpr GLenum dsAttachments[] = {GL_DEPTH, GL_STENCIL};
796 (void)invalidateImpl(contextMtl, 2, dsAttachments);
797 if (mBackbuffer->getSamples() > 1)
798 {
799 encoder->setColorStoreAction(MTLStoreActionMultisampleResolve, 0);
800 }
801
802 contextMtl->endEncoding(false);
803
804 // Reset discard flag.
805 onStartedDrawingToFrameBuffer(context);
806 }
807}
808
809angle::Result FramebufferMtl::updateColorRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context,
810 size_t colorIndexGL)
811{
812 ASSERT(colorIndexGL < mtl::kMaxRenderTargets);
813 // Reset load store action
814 mRenderPassDesc.colorAttachments[colorIndexGL].reset();
815 return updateCachedRenderTarget(context, mState.getColorAttachment(colorIndexGL),
816 &mColorRenderTargets[colorIndexGL]);
817}
818
819angle::Result FramebufferMtl::updateDepthRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context)
820{
821 // Reset load store action
822 mRenderPassDesc.depthAttachment.reset();
823 return updateCachedRenderTarget(context, mState.getDepthAttachment(), &mDepthRenderTarget);
824}
825
826angle::Result FramebufferMtl::updateStencilRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context)
827{
828 // Reset load store action
829 mRenderPassDesc.stencilAttachment.reset();
830 return updateCachedRenderTarget(context, mState.getStencilAttachment(), &mStencilRenderTarget);
831}
832
833angle::Result FramebufferMtl::updateCachedRenderTarget(const gl::Context *context,
834 const gl::FramebufferAttachment *attachment,
835 RenderTargetMtl **cachedRenderTarget)
836{
837 RenderTargetMtl *newRenderTarget = nullptr;
838 if (attachment)
839 {
840 ASSERT(attachment->isAttached());
841 ANGLE_TRY(attachment->getRenderTarget(context, attachment->getRenderToTextureSamples(),
842 &newRenderTarget));
843 }
844 *cachedRenderTarget = newRenderTarget;
845 return angle::Result::Continue;
846}
847
848angle::Result FramebufferMtl::getReadableViewForRenderTarget(
849 const gl::Context *context,
850 const RenderTargetMtl &rtt,
851 const gl::Rectangle &readArea,
852 mtl::TextureRef *readableDepthViewOut,
853 mtl::TextureRef *readableStencilViewOut,
854 uint32_t *readableViewLevel,
855 uint32_t *readableViewLayer,
856 gl::Rectangle *readableViewArea)
857{
858 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
859 mtl::TextureRef srcTexture = rtt.getTexture();
860 uint32_t level = rtt.getLevelIndex().get();
861 uint32_t slice = rtt.getLayerIndex();
862
863 // NOTE(hqle): slice is not used atm.
864 ASSERT(slice == 0);
865
866 bool readStencil = readableStencilViewOut;
867
868 if (!srcTexture)
869 {
870 if (readableDepthViewOut)
871 {
872 *readableDepthViewOut = nullptr;
873 }
874 if (readableStencilViewOut)
875 {
876 *readableStencilViewOut = nullptr;
877 }
878 *readableViewArea = readArea;
879 return angle::Result::Continue;
880 }
881
882 bool skipCopy = srcTexture->isShaderReadable();
883 if (rtt.getFormat()->hasDepthAndStencilBits() && readStencil)
884 {
885 // If the texture is packed depth stencil, and we need stencil view,
886 // then it must support creating different format view.
887 skipCopy = skipCopy && srcTexture->supportFormatView();
888 }
889
890 if (skipCopy)
891 {
892 // Texture supports stencil view, just use it directly
893 if (readableDepthViewOut)
894 {
895 *readableDepthViewOut = srcTexture;
896 }
897 if (readableStencilViewOut)
898 {
899 *readableStencilViewOut = srcTexture;
900 }
901 *readableViewLevel = level;
902 *readableViewLayer = slice;
903 *readableViewArea = readArea;
904 }
905 else
906 {
907 ASSERT(srcTexture->textureType() != MTLTextureType3D);
908
909 // Texture doesn't support stencil view or not shader readable, copy to an interminate
910 // texture that supports stencil view and shader read.
911 mtl::TextureRef formatableView = srcTexture->getReadableCopy(
912 contextMtl, contextMtl->getBlitCommandEncoder(), level, slice,
913 MTLRegionMake2D(readArea.x, readArea.y, readArea.width, readArea.height));
914
915 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(contextMtl, formatableView);
916
917 if (readableDepthViewOut)
918 {
919 *readableDepthViewOut = formatableView;
920 }
921 if (readableStencilViewOut)
922 {
923 *readableStencilViewOut = formatableView->getStencilView();
924 }
925
926 *readableViewLevel = 0;
927 *readableViewLayer = 0;
928 *readableViewArea = gl::Rectangle(0, 0, readArea.width, readArea.height);
929 }
930
931 return angle::Result::Continue;
932}
933
934angle::Result FramebufferMtl::prepareRenderPass(const gl::Context *context,
935 mtl::RenderPassDesc *pDescOut)
936{
937 mtl::RenderPassDesc &desc = *pDescOut;
938
939 mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat = nullptr;
940 mRenderPassAttachmentsSameColorType = true;
941 uint32_t maxColorAttachments = static_cast<uint32_t>(mState.getColorAttachments().size());
942 desc.numColorAttachments = 0;
943 desc.sampleCount = 1;
944 for (uint32_t colorIndexGL = 0; colorIndexGL < maxColorAttachments; ++colorIndexGL)
945 {
946 ASSERT(colorIndexGL < mtl::kMaxRenderTargets);
947
948 mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment = desc.colorAttachments[colorIndexGL];
949 const RenderTargetMtl *colorRenderTarget = mColorRenderTargets[colorIndexGL];
950
951 if (colorRenderTarget)
952 {
953 colorRenderTarget->toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&colorAttachment);
954 desc.sampleCount = std::max(desc.sampleCount, colorRenderTarget->getRenderSamples());
955
956 desc.numColorAttachments = std::max(desc.numColorAttachments, colorIndexGL + 1);
957
958 if (!mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat)
959 {
960 mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat = colorRenderTarget->getFormat();
961 }
962 else if (colorRenderTarget->getFormat())
963 {
964 if (mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat->actualAngleFormat().isSint() !=
965 colorRenderTarget->getFormat()->actualAngleFormat().isSint() ||
966 mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat->actualAngleFormat().isUint() !=
967 colorRenderTarget->getFormat()->actualAngleFormat().isUint())
968 {
969 mRenderPassAttachmentsSameColorType = false;
970 }
971 }
972 }
973 else
974 {
975 colorAttachment.reset();
976 }
977 }
978
979 if (mDepthRenderTarget)
980 {
981 mDepthRenderTarget->toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&desc.depthAttachment);
982 desc.sampleCount = std::max(desc.sampleCount, mDepthRenderTarget->getRenderSamples());
983 }
984
985 if (mStencilRenderTarget)
986 {
987 mStencilRenderTarget->toRenderPassAttachmentDesc(&desc.stencilAttachment);
988 desc.sampleCount = std::max(desc.sampleCount, mStencilRenderTarget->getRenderSamples());
989 }
990
991 return angle::Result::Continue;
992}
993
994// Override clear color based on texture's write mask
995void FramebufferMtl::overrideClearColor(const mtl::TextureRef &texture,
996 MTLClearColor clearColor,
997 MTLClearColor *colorOut)
998{
999 if (texture)
1000 {
1001 *colorOut = mtl::EmulatedAlphaClearColor(clearColor, texture->getColorWritableMask());
1002 }
1003 else
1004 {
1005 *colorOut = clearColor;
1006 }
1007}
1008
1009angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearWithLoadOp(const gl::Context *context,
1010 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers,
1011 const mtl::ClearRectParams &clearOpts)
1012{
1013 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1014 bool startedRenderPass = contextMtl->hasStartedRenderPass(mRenderPassDesc);
1015 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = nullptr;
1016
1017 if (startedRenderPass)
1018 {
1019 encoder = ensureRenderPassStarted(context);
1020 if (encoder->hasDrawCalls())
1021 {
1022 // Render pass already has draw calls recorded, it is better to use clear with draw
1023 // operation.
1024 return clearWithDraw(context, clearColorBuffers, clearOpts);
1025 }
1026 else
1027 {
1028 // If render pass has started but there is no draw call yet. It is OK to change the
1029 // loadOp.
1030 return clearWithLoadOpRenderPassStarted(context, clearColorBuffers, clearOpts, encoder);
1031 }
1032 }
1033 else
1034 {
1035 return clearWithLoadOpRenderPassNotStarted(context, clearColorBuffers, clearOpts);
1036 }
1037}
1038
1039angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearWithLoadOpRenderPassNotStarted(
1040 const gl::Context *context,
1041 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers,
1042 const mtl::ClearRectParams &clearOpts)
1043{
1044 mtl::RenderPassDesc tempDesc = mRenderPassDesc;
1045
1046 for (uint32_t colorIndexGL = 0; colorIndexGL < tempDesc.numColorAttachments; ++colorIndexGL)
1047 {
1048 ASSERT(colorIndexGL < mtl::kMaxRenderTargets);
1049
1050 mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment =
1051 tempDesc.colorAttachments[colorIndexGL];
1052 const mtl::TextureRef &texture = colorAttachment.texture();
1053
1054 if (clearColorBuffers.test(colorIndexGL))
1055 {
1056 colorAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
1057 OverrideMTLClearColor(texture, clearOpts.clearColor.value(),
1058 &colorAttachment.clearColor);
1059 }
1060 }
1061
1062 if (clearOpts.clearDepth.valid())
1063 {
1064 tempDesc.depthAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
1065 tempDesc.depthAttachment.clearDepth = clearOpts.clearDepth.value();
1066 }
1067
1068 if (clearOpts.clearStencil.valid())
1069 {
1070 tempDesc.stencilAttachment.loadAction = MTLLoadActionClear;
1071 tempDesc.stencilAttachment.clearStencil = clearOpts.clearStencil.value();
1072 }
1073
1074 // Start new render encoder with loadOp=Clear
1075 ensureRenderPassStarted(context, tempDesc);
1076
1077 return angle::Result::Continue;
1078}
1079
1080angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearWithLoadOpRenderPassStarted(
1081 const gl::Context *context,
1082 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers,
1083 const mtl::ClearRectParams &clearOpts,
1084 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder)
1085{
1086 ASSERT(!encoder->hasDrawCalls());
1087
1088 for (uint32_t colorIndexGL = 0; colorIndexGL < mRenderPassDesc.numColorAttachments;
1089 ++colorIndexGL)
1090 {
1091 ASSERT(colorIndexGL < mtl::kMaxRenderTargets);
1092
1093 mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment =
1094 mRenderPassDesc.colorAttachments[colorIndexGL];
1095 const mtl::TextureRef &texture = colorAttachment.texture();
1096
1097 if (clearColorBuffers.test(colorIndexGL))
1098 {
1099 MTLClearColor clearVal;
1100 OverrideMTLClearColor(texture, clearOpts.clearColor.value(), &clearVal);
1101
1102 encoder->setColorLoadAction(MTLLoadActionClear, clearVal, colorIndexGL);
1103 }
1104 }
1105
1106 if (clearOpts.clearDepth.valid())
1107 {
1108 encoder->setDepthLoadAction(MTLLoadActionClear, clearOpts.clearDepth.value());
1109 }
1110
1111 if (clearOpts.clearStencil.valid())
1112 {
1113 encoder->setStencilLoadAction(MTLLoadActionClear, clearOpts.clearStencil.value());
1114 }
1115
1116 return angle::Result::Continue;
1117}
1118
1119angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearWithDraw(const gl::Context *context,
1120 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers,
1121 const mtl::ClearRectParams &clearOpts)
1122{
1123 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1124 DisplayMtl *display = contextMtl->getDisplay();
1125
1126 if (mRenderPassAttachmentsSameColorType)
1127 {
1128 // Start new render encoder if not already.
1129 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = ensureRenderPassStarted(context, mRenderPassDesc);
1130
1131 return display->getUtils().clearWithDraw(context, encoder, clearOpts);
1132 }
1133
1134 // Not all attachments have the same color type.
1135 mtl::ClearRectParams overrideClearOps = clearOpts;
1136 overrideClearOps.enabledBuffers.reset();
1137
1138 // First clear depth/stencil without color attachment
1139 if (clearOpts.clearDepth.valid() || clearOpts.clearStencil.valid())
1140 {
1141 mtl::RenderPassDesc dsOnlyDesc = mRenderPassDesc;
1142 dsOnlyDesc.numColorAttachments = 0;
1143 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder = contextMtl->getRenderPassCommandEncoder(dsOnlyDesc);
1144
1145 ANGLE_TRY(display->getUtils().clearWithDraw(context, encoder, overrideClearOps));
1146 }
1147
1148 // Clear the color attachment one by one.
1149 overrideClearOps.enabledBuffers.set(0);
1150 for (size_t drawbuffer : clearColorBuffers)
1151 {
1152 if (drawbuffer >= mRenderPassDesc.numColorAttachments)
1153 {
1154 // Iteration over drawbuffer indices always goes in ascending order
1155 break;
1156 }
1157 RenderTargetMtl *renderTarget = mColorRenderTargets[drawbuffer];
1158 if (!renderTarget || !renderTarget->getTexture())
1159 {
1160 continue;
1161 }
1162 const mtl::Format &format = *renderTarget->getFormat();
1163 mtl::PixelType clearColorType = overrideClearOps.clearColor.value().getType();
1164 if ((clearColorType == mtl::PixelType::Int && !format.actualAngleFormat().isSint()) ||
1165 (clearColorType == mtl::PixelType::UInt && !format.actualAngleFormat().isUint()) ||
1166 (clearColorType == mtl::PixelType::Float && format.actualAngleFormat().isInt()))
1167 {
1168 continue;
1169 }
1170
1171 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder =
1172 contextMtl->getRenderTargetCommandEncoder(*renderTarget);
1173 ANGLE_TRY(display->getUtils().clearWithDraw(context, encoder, overrideClearOps));
1174 }
1175
1176 return angle::Result::Continue;
1177}
1178
1179angle::Result FramebufferMtl::clearImpl(const gl::Context *context,
1180 gl::DrawBufferMask clearColorBuffers,
1181 mtl::ClearRectParams *pClearOpts)
1182{
1183 auto &clearOpts = *pClearOpts;
1184
1185 if (!clearOpts.clearColor.valid() && !clearOpts.clearDepth.valid() &&
1186 !clearOpts.clearStencil.valid())
1187 {
1188 // No Op.
1189 return angle::Result::Continue;
1190 }
1191
1192 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1193 const gl::Rectangle renderArea(0, 0, mState.getDimensions().width,
1194 mState.getDimensions().height);
1195
1196 clearOpts.colorFormat = mRenderPassFirstColorAttachmentFormat;
1197 clearOpts.dstTextureSize = mState.getExtents();
1198 clearOpts.clearArea = ClipRectToScissor(contextMtl->getState(), renderArea, false);
1199 clearOpts.flipY = mFlipY;
1200
1201 // Discard clear altogether if scissor has 0 width or height.
1202 if (clearOpts.clearArea.width == 0 || clearOpts.clearArea.height == 0)
1203 {
1204 return angle::Result::Continue;
1205 }
1206
1207 clearOpts.clearColorMask = contextMtl->getColorMask();
1208 uint32_t stencilMask = contextMtl->getStencilMask();
1209 if (!contextMtl->getDepthMask())
1210 {
1211 // Disable depth clearing, since depth write is disable
1212 clearOpts.clearDepth.reset();
1213 }
1214
1215 // Only clear enabled buffers
1216 clearOpts.enabledBuffers = clearColorBuffers;
1217
1218 if (clearOpts.clearArea == renderArea &&
1219 (!clearOpts.clearColor.valid() || clearOpts.clearColorMask == MTLColorWriteMaskAll) &&
1220 (!clearOpts.clearStencil.valid() ||
1221 (stencilMask & mtl::kStencilMaskAll) == mtl::kStencilMaskAll))
1222 {
1223 return clearWithLoadOp(context, clearColorBuffers, clearOpts);
1224 }
1225
1226 return clearWithDraw(context, clearColorBuffers, clearOpts);
1227}
1228
1229angle::Result FramebufferMtl::invalidateImpl(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
1230 size_t count,
1231 const GLenum *attachments)
1232{
1233 gl::DrawBufferMask invalidateColorBuffers;
1234 bool invalidateDepthBuffer = false;
1235 bool invalidateStencilBuffer = false;
1236
1237 for (size_t i = 0; i < count; ++i)
1238 {
1239 const GLenum attachment = attachments[i];
1240
1241 switch (attachment)
1242 {
1243 case GL_DEPTH:
1244 case GL_DEPTH_ATTACHMENT:
1245 invalidateDepthBuffer = true;
1246 break;
1247 case GL_STENCIL:
1248 case GL_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT:
1249 invalidateStencilBuffer = true;
1250 break;
1251 case GL_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT:
1252 invalidateDepthBuffer = true;
1253 invalidateStencilBuffer = true;
1254 break;
1255 default:
1256 ASSERT(
1257 (attachment >= GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0 && attachment <= GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT15) ||
1258 (attachment == GL_COLOR));
1259
1260 invalidateColorBuffers.set(
1261 attachment == GL_COLOR ? 0u : (attachment - GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0));
1262 }
1263 }
1264
1265 // Set the appropriate storeOp for attachments.
1266 // If we already start the render pass, then need to set the store action now.
1267 bool renderPassStarted = contextMtl->hasStartedRenderPass(mRenderPassDesc);
1268 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *encoder =
1269 renderPassStarted ? contextMtl->getRenderCommandEncoder() : nullptr;
1270
1271 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < mRenderPassDesc.numColorAttachments; ++i)
1272 {
1273 if (invalidateColorBuffers.test(i))
1274 {
1275 mtl::RenderPassColorAttachmentDesc &colorAttachment =
1276 mRenderPassDesc.colorAttachments[i];
1277 colorAttachment.storeAction = MTLStoreActionDontCare;
1278 if (renderPassStarted)
1279 {
1280 encoder->setColorStoreAction(MTLStoreActionDontCare, i);
1281 }
1282 }
1283 }
1284
1285 if (invalidateDepthBuffer && mDepthRenderTarget)
1286 {
1287 mRenderPassDesc.depthAttachment.storeAction = MTLStoreActionDontCare;
1288 if (renderPassStarted)
1289 {
1290 encoder->setDepthStoreAction(MTLStoreActionDontCare);
1291 }
1292 }
1293
1294 if (invalidateStencilBuffer && mStencilRenderTarget)
1295 {
1296 mRenderPassDesc.stencilAttachment.storeAction = MTLStoreActionDontCare;
1297 if (renderPassStarted)
1298 {
1299 encoder->setStencilStoreAction(MTLStoreActionDontCare);
1300 }
1301 }
1302
1303 return angle::Result::Continue;
1304}
1305
1306gl::Rectangle FramebufferMtl::getCorrectFlippedReadArea(const gl::Context *context,
1307 const gl::Rectangle &glArea) const
1308{
1309 RenderTargetMtl *readRT = getColorReadRenderTarget(context);
1310 if (!readRT)
1311 {
1312 readRT = mDepthRenderTarget;
1313 }
1314 if (!readRT)
1315 {
1316 readRT = mStencilRenderTarget;
1317 }
1318 ASSERT(readRT);
1319 gl::Rectangle flippedArea = glArea;
1320 if (mFlipY)
1321 {
1322 flippedArea.y =
1323 readRT->getTexture()->height(readRT->getLevelIndex()) -
1324 flippedArea.y - flippedArea.height;
1325 }
1326
1327 return flippedArea;
1328}
1329
1330angle::Result FramebufferMtl::readPixelsImpl(const gl::Context *context,
1331 const gl::Rectangle &area,
1332 const PackPixelsParams &packPixelsParams,
1333 const RenderTargetMtl *renderTarget,
1334 uint8_t *pixels) const
1335{
1336 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1337 if (!renderTarget)
1338 {
1339 return angle::Result::Continue;
1340 }
1341 if (packPixelsParams.packBuffer)
1342 {
1343 return readPixelsToPBO(context, area, packPixelsParams, renderTarget);
1344 }
1345
1346 mtl::TextureRef texture;
1347 if (mBackbuffer)
1348 {
1349 // Backbuffer might have MSAA texture as render target, needs to obtain the
1350 // resolved texture to be able to read pixels.
1351 ANGLE_TRY(mBackbuffer->ensureColorTextureReadyForReadPixels(context));
1352 texture = mBackbuffer->getColorTexture();
1353 }
1354 else
1355 {
1356 texture = renderTarget->getTexture();
1357 // For non-default framebuffer, MSAA read pixels is disallowed.
1358 if(!texture)
1359 {
1360 return angle::Result::Stop;
1361 }
1362 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(contextMtl, texture->samples() == 1, GL_INVALID_OPERATION);
1363 }
1364
1365 const mtl::Format &readFormat = *renderTarget->getFormat();
1366 const angle::Format &readAngleFormat = readFormat.actualAngleFormat();
1367
1368 int bufferRowPitch = area.width * readAngleFormat.pixelBytes;
1369 angle::MemoryBuffer readPixelRowBuffer;
1370 ANGLE_CHECK_GL_ALLOC(contextMtl, readPixelRowBuffer.resize(bufferRowPitch));
1371
1372 auto packPixelsRowParams = packPixelsParams;
1373 gl::Rectangle srcRowRegion(area.x, area.y, area.width, 1);
1374
1375 int rowOffset = packPixelsParams.reverseRowOrder ? -1 : 1;
1376 int startRow = packPixelsParams.reverseRowOrder ? (area.y1() - 1) : area.y;
1377
1378 // Copy pixels row by row
1379 packPixelsRowParams.area.height = 1;
1380 packPixelsRowParams.reverseRowOrder = false;
1381 for (int r = startRow, i = 0; i < area.height;
1382 ++i, r += rowOffset, pixels += packPixelsRowParams.outputPitch)
1383 {
1384 srcRowRegion.y = r;
1385 packPixelsRowParams.area.y = packPixelsParams.area.y + i;
1386
1387 // Read the pixels data to the row buffer
1388 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::ReadTexturePerSliceBytes(
1389 context, texture, bufferRowPitch, srcRowRegion, renderTarget->getLevelIndex(),
1390 renderTarget->getLayerIndex(), readPixelRowBuffer.data()));
1391
1392 // Convert to destination format
1393 PackPixels(packPixelsRowParams, readAngleFormat, bufferRowPitch, readPixelRowBuffer.data(),
1394 pixels);
1395 }
1396
1397 return angle::Result::Continue;
1398}
1399
1400angle::Result FramebufferMtl::readPixelsToPBO(const gl::Context *context,
1401 const gl::Rectangle &area,
1402 const PackPixelsParams &packPixelsParams,
1403 const RenderTargetMtl *renderTarget) const
1404{
1405 ASSERT(packPixelsParams.packBuffer);
1406 ASSERT(renderTarget);
1407
1408 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1409
1410 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(contextMtl, packPixelsParams.offset <= std::numeric_limits<uint32_t>::max(),
1411 GL_INVALID_OPERATION);
1412 uint32_t offset = static_cast<uint32_t>(packPixelsParams.offset);
1413
1414 BufferMtl *packBufferMtl = mtl::GetImpl(packPixelsParams.packBuffer);
1415 mtl::BufferRef dstBuffer = packBufferMtl->getCurrentBuffer();
1416
1417 return readPixelsToBuffer(context, area, renderTarget, packPixelsParams.reverseRowOrder,
1418 *packPixelsParams.destFormat, offset, packPixelsParams.outputPitch,
1419 &dstBuffer);
1420}
1421
1422angle::Result FramebufferMtl::readPixelsToBuffer(const gl::Context *context,
1423 const gl::Rectangle &area,
1424 const RenderTargetMtl *renderTarget,
1425 bool reverseRowOrder,
1426 const angle::Format &dstAngleFormat,
1427 uint32_t dstBufferOffset,
1428 uint32_t dstBufferRowPitch,
1429 const mtl::BufferRef *pDstBuffer) const
1430{
1431 ASSERT(renderTarget);
1432
1433 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
1434
1435 const mtl::Format &readFormat = *renderTarget->getFormat();
1436 const angle::Format &readAngleFormat = readFormat.actualAngleFormat();
1437
1438 mtl::TextureRef texture = renderTarget->getTexture();
1439
1440 const mtl::BufferRef &dstBuffer = *pDstBuffer;
1441
1442 if (dstAngleFormat.id != readAngleFormat.id || texture->samples() > 1 ||
1443 (dstBufferOffset % dstAngleFormat.pixelBytes) ||
1444 (dstBufferOffset % mtl::kTextureToBufferBlittingAlignment))
1445 {
1446 const angle::Format *actualDstAngleFormat;
1447
1448 // SRGB is special case: We need to write sRGB values to buffer, not linear values.
1449 switch (readAngleFormat.id)
1450 {
1451 case angle::FormatID::B8G8R8A8_UNORM_SRGB:
1452 case angle::FormatID::R8G8B8_UNORM_SRGB:
1453 case angle::FormatID::R8G8B8A8_UNORM_SRGB:
1454 if (dstAngleFormat.id != readAngleFormat.id)
1455 {
1456 switch (dstAngleFormat.id)
1457 {
1458 case angle::FormatID::B8G8R8A8_UNORM:
1459 actualDstAngleFormat =
1460 &angle::Format::Get(angle::FormatID::B8G8R8A8_UNORM_SRGB);
1461 break;
1462 case angle::FormatID::R8G8B8A8_UNORM:
1463 actualDstAngleFormat =
1464 &angle::Format::Get(angle::FormatID::R8G8B8A8_UNORM_SRGB);
1465 break;
1466 default:
1467 // Unsupported format.
1468 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(contextMtl, false, GL_INVALID_ENUM);
1469 }
1470 break;
1471 }
1472 OS_FALLTHROUGH;
1473 default:
1474 actualDstAngleFormat = &dstAngleFormat;
1475 }
1476
1477 // Use compute shader
1478 mtl::CopyPixelsToBufferParams params;
1479 params.buffer = dstBuffer;
1480 params.bufferStartOffset = dstBufferOffset;
1481 params.bufferRowPitch = dstBufferRowPitch;
1482
1483 params.texture = texture;
1484 params.textureArea = area;
1485 params.textureLevel = renderTarget->getLevelIndex();
1486 params.textureSliceOrDeph = renderTarget->getLayerIndex();
1487 params.reverseTextureRowOrder = reverseRowOrder;
1488
1489 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getDisplay()->getUtils().packPixelsFromTextureToBuffer(
1490 contextMtl, *actualDstAngleFormat, params));
1491 }
1492 else
1493 {
1494 // Use blit command encoder
1495 if (!reverseRowOrder)
1496 {
1497 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::ReadTexturePerSliceBytesToBuffer(
1498 context, texture, dstBufferRowPitch, area, renderTarget->getLevelIndex(),
1499 renderTarget->getLayerIndex(), dstBufferOffset, dstBuffer));
1500 }
1501 else
1502 {
1503 gl::Rectangle srcRowRegion(area.x, area.y, area.width, 1);
1504
1505 int startRow = area.y1() - 1;
1506
1507 uint32_t bufferRowOffset = dstBufferOffset;
1508 // Copy pixels row by row
1509 for (int r = startRow, i = 0; i < area.height;
1510 ++i, --r, bufferRowOffset += dstBufferRowPitch)
1511 {
1512 srcRowRegion.y = r;
1513
1514 // Read the pixels data to the buffer's row
1515 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::ReadTexturePerSliceBytesToBuffer(
1516 context, texture, dstBufferRowPitch, srcRowRegion,
1517 renderTarget->getLevelIndex(), renderTarget->getLayerIndex(), bufferRowOffset,
1518 dstBuffer));
1519 }
1520 }
1521 }
1522
1523 return angle::Result::Continue;
1524}
1525}
1526
